name: Klepto Run!
description:
Created For BGDJam 2022 / USE FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Controls : Space Bar / Left Click

You're playing as Madam Klepto who likes to steal chocolate from stores, but you can choose to be a good civilian by not taking any chocolate, or become a menace to society by stealing chocolate!

Credits :

  • Candrapota (Project Lead, Game Designer, Game Artist)
